channel.title: Comments on: On safari in Botswana

item.title: By: Getz destinations
item.dc:creator: Getz destinations
item.description: What an amazing experience of safari, such trips makes people feel alive. I was planning to visit somewhere and you gave me a perfect destination to explore. Thanks for sharing.
item.content:encoded: What an amazing experience of safari, such trips makes people feel alive. I was planning to visit somewhere and you gave me a perfect destination to explore. Thanks for sharing.

item.title: By: Leigh
item.dc:creator: Leigh
item.description: I think Botswana is leading when it comes to Safari in Southen African region
item.content:encoded: I think Botswana is leading when it comes to Safari in Southen African region

item.title: By: opole
item.dc:creator: opole
item.description: Botswana is such a wonderful and beautiful country home to elephants and lions as in Kenya
item.content:encoded: Botswana is such a wonderful and beautiful country home to elephants and lions as in Kenya

item.title: By: Steven
item.dc:creator: Steven
item.description: Great story of a safari trip.. it must be so exciting
item.content:encoded: Great story of a safari trip.. it must be so exciting
